channel.title: Startup on Lucio Palazzo

item.title: Determinants of social startups in Italy
item.description: The aim of this paper is to investigate the relevant factors influencing the presence of social startups in Italy at the provincial level. The outcome variable is the number of active social startups in Italian provinces while the set of explanatory variables is composed by economic and demographic indicators at the provincial level.
